name: Colorless World (Lubius-Studio)
description:
the game is very simple its an open world  when all the colors are disappeared  and you have to bring them back and repaint the world calm and satisfying game

sorry  I  didnt do much only one Quest 2 colors, I didn't have enough time , I hope you enjoy it (:

move with : A W S D

Jump with : Space 

switch color : LeftShift (It does not working in the web idk why  )

click to paint: Left mouse button
